title: Twice Baked Sweet Potatoes with Ricotta Cheese
note: Can be made about 20 min ahead
instructions: Preheat oven to 400°F. Pierce potatoes with a fork and bake until soft, about an hour.
Remove from oven and cool until potatoes can be handled.
Reduce oven temp to 350°F. Grease large baking sheet.
Place olive oil in small skillet over med heat. Add shallots and cook and stir until softened, beginning to brown, about 10 min.
Cut potatoes in half lengthwise and scoop out pulp, leaving the skin intact.
Place pulp into a blender or food processor and blend until smooth.
Add ricotta, salt, pepper, ginger, sage, to the blender. Blend until smooth.
Return potato mixture to bowl. Stir in shallots, Parmesan cheese, and sage.
Spoon mixture back into potato skins.
Place potatoes on prepared baking sheet.
Bake until heated through, about 30 mins.
